org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io

类 BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io.BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence
  • 封闭类:
    BufferSpiller

    public static class BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a sequence of spilled buffers and events, created by the BufferSpiller. The sequence of buffers and events can be read back using the method getNext().

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer
      The byte buffer for bulk reading.
      private java.io.File file
      The file containing the data.
      private java.nio.channels.FileChannel fileChannel
      The file channel to draw the data from.
      private static int HEADER_LENGTH
      Header is "channel index" (4 bytes) + length (4 bytes) + buffer/event (1 byte).
      private boolean opened
      Flag to track whether the sequence has been opened already.
      private int pageSize
      The page size to instantiate properly sized memory segments.
      private long size
      We store this size as a constant because it is crucial it never changes.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SpilledBufferOrEventSequence(java.io.File file, java.nio.channels.FileChannel fileChannel, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, int pageSize)
      Create a reader that reads a sequence of spilled buffers and events.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cleanup()
      Cleans up all file resources held by this spilled sequence.
      BufferOrEvent getNext()
      Gets the next BufferOrEvent from the spilled sequence, or null, if the sequence is exhausted.
      void open()
      Initializes the sequence for reading.
      long size()
      Gets the size of this spilled sequence.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • HEADER_LENGTH

        private static final int HEADER_LENGTH
        Header is "channel index" (4 bytes) + length (4 bytes) + buffer/event (1 byte).
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • file

        private final java.io.File file
        The file containing the data.

      • fileChannel

        private final java.nio.channels.FileChannel fileChannel
        The file channel to draw the data from.

      • buffer

        private final java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer
        The byte buffer for bulk reading.

      • size

        private final long size
        We store this size as a constant because it is crucial it never changes.

      • pageSize

        private final int pageSize
        The page size to instantiate properly sized memory segments.

      • opened

        private boolean opened
        Flag to track whether the sequence has been opened already.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SpilledBufferOrEventSequence

        SpilledBufferOrEventSequence(java.io.File file,
                             java.nio.channels.FileChannel fileChannel,
                             java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                             int pageSize)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Create a reader that reads a sequence of spilled buffers and events.
        参数:
        file - The file with the data.
        fileChannel - The file channel to read the data from.
        buffer - The buffer used for bulk reading.
        pageSize - The page size to use for the created memory segments.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public void open()
        Initializes the sequence for reading. This method needs to be called before the first call to getNext(). Otherwise the results of getNext() are not predictable.

      • getNext

        public BufferOrEvent getNext()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the next BufferOrEvent from the spilled sequence, or null, if the sequence is exhausted.
        返回:
        The next BufferOrEvent from the spilled sequence, or null (end of sequence).
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the reads failed, of if the byte stream is corrupt.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Cleans up all file resources held by this spilled sequence.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if file channel closing or file deletion fail.

      • size

        public long size()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the size of this spilled sequence.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
